snippet: A father accused of killing his five children believed they “were going to kill him, chop him up and feed him to the dogs,” according to an arrest warrant,
abstract: South Carolina arrest warrant says Timothy R Jones Jr, father accused of killing his five children, believed they 'were going to kill him, chop him up and feed him to the dogs.'
lead_paragraph: A father accused of killing his five children believed they “were going to kill him, chop him up and feed him to the dogs,” according to an arrest warrant,

headline.main: South Carolina: Father Held in Killings Spoke of Fear
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Father Held in Killings Spoke of Fear
